title: Fishing Tackle Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of fishing gear, tackle, and equipment. How well do you know your rods, reels, and lures?

questions.question: Which type of fishing reel has a revolving spool and is mounted on top of the rod?
What is a fishing lure designed to do?
options: Attract fish by mimicking prey through color, movement, or vibration

questions.question: Which small, round weight is clamped onto fishing line to help sink the bait?
What is a bobber (float) used for in fishing?
options: Keeping bait at a desired depth and signaling when a fish bites

questions.question: Which tool is used to remove a hook from a fish's mouth safely?
What is the 'drag' on a fishing reel?
options: An adjustable friction system that controls how easily line is pulled off the spool

questions.question: Which type of fishing line is nearly invisible underwater and often used as a leader?
What is a tackle box used for?
options: Organizing and storing hooks, lures, sinkers, and other fishing accessories

questions.question: Which fishing lure has a metal lip that causes it to dive and wobble when retrieved?
What is a gaff used for in fishing?
options: A large hook on a handle used to land heavy fish

questions.question: Which small device connects the fishing line to the leader and prevents line twist?
What is a fishing net used for?
options: Scooping up and landing hooked fish from the water

questions.question: Which type of lure is a weighted hook with a soft body, bounced along the bottom?
What does 'test' mean when referring to fishing line (e.g., '10-pound test')?
options: The maximum weight the line can hold before breaking

questions.question: Which tool is a spring-loaded scale used to weigh caught fish?
